hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Urwah (that) Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray eleven rak'ahs, making it odd (witr) by one between the time when he finished 'Isha and dawn, and he would prostrate for as long as it takes one of you to recite fifty verses before raising his head

chapter.ara-name: باب السُّجُودِ بَعْدَ الْفَرَاغِ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ
